title: Weir Farm National Historic Site: Parking
body: Parking        The Weir family purchased their first automobile around 1913 National Park Service, Weir Farm National Historic Site   Â    There are a limited number of parking spaces available in the parking lot. Once these spaces are filled, the parking lot will be closed. The parking lot cannot accommodate RVs, buses, or other large vehicles. If you are planning to bring a group that will arrive in more than three vehicles, please call ahead to arrange a group visit. For more information about parking or to arrange a group visit, please call Park Ranger Kathryn Hanley at (203) 834-1896 ext. 12.
